question: Who won the maiden Professional Squash Association (PSA) title recently?
explanation: US-based Indian squash player Ramit Tandon has won his Professional Squash Association (PSA) title. This was Tandon's third appearance in a Professional Squash Association final. Tandon, who had come into this event as a qualifier beat third seed Kumar 11-3, 11 -2, 11-3 in the final.
